planned_vs_actual.actual: Flag removed from metadata and config, logic inlined in engine.ts

what_went_well: Autonomous identification of mature features worked effectively.
Cleanup was straightforward due to clear feature boundaries.
what_could_improve: Future cycles could include automated PR generation for these promotions.
unexpected_opportunities: Identified FEATURE_UI_INTONATION_HEATMAPS as the next big UI project.
technical_insights: Inlining logic in the engine makes the pedagogical flow more transparent for new developers.

next_opportunities.immediate_expansion: Implement heatmaps for better feedback visualization.
complementary_features: Achievement system integration with adaptive difficulty milestones

impact_assessment.user_impact: 100% of users benefit from guaranteed personalized difficulty.
impact_assessment.competitive_impact: Solidifies 'Smart Practice' as a core product value.
